data.title: Norma Shearer - Trivia, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Norma Shearer: her birthday, what she did before fame, her family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

She won an Academy Award in the Best Actress category for her role in the 1930 film The Divorcee. Her roles in Romeo and Juliet and The Women bolstered her fame.

Before Fame

She won a beauty pageant when she was fourteen years old. In 1920, she moved from Canada to New York with her mother, Edith, and her sister, Athole.

Trivia

She spent a lot of money on eye doctors to correct a muscular weakness that caused her eyes to cross.

Family Life

She was married to Irving Thalberg from 1927 until his death in 1936. She then married Martin Arrouge in 1942. She had two children with Thalberg named Katherine and Irving Jr.

Associated With
